data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Saint Paul. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Paul, Antigua and Barbuda
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 6,199 people in the state of Saint Paul who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Saint Paul, Antigua and Barbuda to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 9,100 citizens of Saint Paul, Antigua and Barbuda, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 2,257 believers find a person of peace today among the 6,843 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 2,257 believers in the state of Saint Paul with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Saint Paul, Antigua and Barbuda.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
